org.cloudbus.cloudsim.core.predicates

Class Predicate

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.cloudbus.cloudsim.core.predicates.Predicate
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    PredicateAny, PredicateFrom, PredicateNone, PredicateNotFrom, PredicateNotType, PredicateType

    public abstract class Predicate
extends Object
    Predicates are used to select events from the deferred queue, according to required criteria. They are used internally the by CloudSim class and aren't intended to be used directly by the user. This class is abstract and must be extended when writing a new predicate. Each subclass define the criteria to select received events. Some standard predicates are provided.
    The idea of simulation predicates was copied from SimJava 2.
    Since:
    CloudSim Toolkit 1.0
    Author:
    Marcos Dias de Assuncao
    See Also:
    PredicateType, PredicateFrom, PredicateAny, PredicateNone

    • Constructor Detail

      • Predicate

        public Predicate()

    • Method Detail

      • match

        public abstract boolean match(SimEvent event)
        Verifies if a given event matches the required criteria. The method is called for each event in the deferred queue when a method such as CloudSim.select(int, org.cloudbus.cloudsim.core.predicates.Predicate) is called.
        Parameters:
        event - The event to test for a match.
        Returns:
        true if the event matches and should be selected, or false if it does not match the predicate.
